subject: Volleyball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Megan Hodge had 16 kills and Penn State ended its perfect season with a second straight N.C.A.A. women’s volleyball title, sweeping Stanford by 25-20, 26-24, 25-23, in Omaha on Saturday.
snippet: Megan Hodge had 16 kills and Penn State ended its perfect season with a second straight N.C.A.A. women’s volleyball title, sweeping Stanford by 25-20, 26-24, 25-23, in Omaha on Saturday.
